subject: svn commit: samba-docs r1111 - in trunk/manpages-3: .
body:
Author: kseeger
Date: 2007-05-11 09:01:52 +0000 (Fri, 11 May 2007)
New Revision: 1111

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-docs&rev=1111

Log:
Add documentation for new net sam subcommand "unmapunixgroup".
Modified:
   trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml
===================================================================
--- trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml	2007-05-10 17:07:44 UTC (rev 1110)
+++ trunk/manpages-3/net.8.xml	2007-05-11 09:01:52 UTC (rev 1111)
@@ -961,6 +961,15 @@
 

+SAM UNMAPUNIXGROUP <NAME>
+
+
+Remove an existing group mapping entry.
+
+
+
+
+
SAM ADDMEM <GROUP> <MEMBER>
